Package domain

Class Card

java.lang.Object
domain.Card
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Entity public class Card extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a credit card belonging to a user.
See Also:

    • Card

      public Card(Long cardNumber, Date expirationDate, Integer securityCode, Double money, User owner)
      Constructor. Initializes the card number, the expiration date and the security code of the card.
      Parameters:
      cardNumber - card number
      expirationDate - expiration date (dd/mm)
      securityCode - security code of the card
